# BEGIN: Test for dfs2 function
test_dfs2 <- function() {
  # Create a sample graph
  graph <- list(
    A = c("B", "C"),
    B = c("D"),
    C = c("E"),
    D = c("F"),
    E = c("G"),
    F = c("H"),
    G = c(),
    H = c()
  )
  
  # Call the dfs2 function
  result <- dfs2(graph, "A")
  
  # Check if the result is correct
  expected_result <- c("A", "B", "D", "F", "H", "C", "E", "G")
  stopifnot(identical(result, expected_result))
}

# Run the test
test_dfs2()
# END: Test for dfs2 function
